overview: The Champions League game at Anfield on October 1st against PSV Eindhoven saw Liverpool’s inspirational captain and one of World football’s truly great players reach a major career landmark with his 100th first team goal for The Reds. It is the quality of his goals, the importance of his goals and the incredible excitement they deliver which makes this programme a truly memorable record.
tagline: A commemorative DVD for the fans about a true Premiership & Liverpool F.C great.
title: Steven Gerrard - Centurion
